testimonial1.text: Holiday Calendar has transformed how I plan and celebrate holidays. It's an invaluable resource!
testimonial1.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.text: As someone new to the US, this website helps me understand and participate in American holidays.
testimonial2.author: Michael Chen

testimonial3.text: The countdown feature keeps my family excited and prepared for upcoming celebrations.
testimonial3.author: Emily Rodriguez

question1.a: Yes, we cover all federal holidays and major cultural celebrations in the United States.

question2.a: Our countdowns are synchronized with atomic time servers for precise accuracy.

question3.q: Can I get notifications for upcoming holidays?
question3.a: Yes, you can set custom reminders for any holiday in our calendar.
